original_text: And as the ark of the Lord came into the city of David, Michal Saul's daughter looked through a window, and saw king David leaping and dancing before the Lord; and she despised him in her heart.
korean_text: 여호와의 궤가 다윗 성으로 들어올 때에 사울의 딸 미갈이 창으로 내다보다가 다윗 왕이 여호와 앞에서 뛰놀며 춤추는 것을 보고 심중에 그를 업신여기니라

sentences.original_text: And as the ark of the Lord came into the city of David
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 궤가 다윗 성에 들어올 때에

sentences.original_text: Michal Saul's daughter looked through a window
and saw king David leaping and dancing before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 왕 다윗이 주 앞에서 뛰고 춤추는 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: and she despised him in her heart
